experience.description: I worked with a team developing an activity management system and a reporting system in C#. We used ASP.NET Web Forms, Visual Studio Team Foundation Server and Microsoft SQL Server.

I created a website developed in PHP with Laravel framework and I used the technologies JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, MySQL and GitHub. The website was develop for the sale of electronic products (e-commerce). Also has an administrative section for the control of products, inventories, orders and users.
I created a informative website developed in PHP. The website was develop to provide clients with information about consultancies for environmental management and industrial products.
